data.name: ModeloCheque
data.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="yes"?><root type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.Document" id="1" version="2" GridStep="59.055118110236222" IsTemplate="true" CommonScript="private string FormatValorAsterisco(string valor, int casas)
{
 string format = "#";
 
 int totalMeio = Convert.ToInt32(Math.Round(Convert.ToDecimal(((casas - (valor.ToString().Length+3)) / 2)), 0));

 for (int i = 0; i < (casas - 2); i++)
 {
 if (i == totalMeio)
 {
 format += "R$ "+valor.ToString();
 i = i + (("R$ "+valor.ToString()).Length - 1);
 }
 else
 format += "*";
 }

 return format+"#";
}

private string FormatValorExtenso(string valor, int blk, int casas)
{
 string format = valor.ToString();

 for (int i = (format.ToString()).Length; i < casas; i++)
 {
 format += "* ";
 i = i+2;
 }

 format = Stuff(format, blk, casas);
 
 for (int i = (format.ToString()).Length; i < casas; i++)
 {
 format += "* ";
 i = i+2;
 }

 return format;
}

private string Stuff(string str, int blk, int casas)
{
 System.Collections.Generic.List<string> linhaStr = new System.Collections.Generic.List<string>();
 string linhaCurrent = "";
 string retorno = "";
 string espaco = "";

 string[] strArray = str.Split(new string[] { " " }, StringSplitOptions.None);

 for (int i = 0; i < strArray.Length; i++)
 {
 if ((linhaCurrent + strArray[i]).Length > blk)
 {
 linhaStr.Add(linhaCurrent);
 linhaCurrent = strArray[i];
 }
 else
 {
 linhaCurrent += espaco + strArray[i];
 espaco = " ";
 }
 }

 linhaStr.Add(linhaCurrent);

 for (int i = 0; i < (linhaStr.Count-1); i++)
 {
 if (linhaStr[i].Length < blk)
 {
 string[] linhaArray = linhaStr[i].Split(new string[] { " " }, StringSplitOptions.None);

 int espacosAdd = blk - linhaStr[i].Length;

 int x = 0;
 for (int y = 0; y < espacosAdd; y++)
 {
 if (x > (linhaArray.Length - 1))
 {
 x = 0;
 }
 int pos = (linhaStr[i].IndexOf(linhaArray[x]) + linhaArray[x].Length);
 linhaStr[i] = linhaStr[i].Insert(pos, " ");
 x++;
 }
 }
 }

 string br = "";
 for (int i = 0; i < linhaStr.Count; i++)
 {
 retorno = retorno + br + linhaStr[i];
 br = "<br/><br/>";
 }


 return retorno;
}
" Title="Cheque" Description="Template is generated by wizard" ScriptLanguage="CSharp" DoublePass="true" Name="document1"><DataSources type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.Data.DocumentDataSourceCollection"  Mes.Text = "JANEIRO";
else if(Mes.Text == "2")
 Mes.Text = "FEVEREIRO";
else if(Mes.Text == "3")
 Mes.Text = "MARÇO";
else if(Mes.Text == "4")
 Mes.Text = "ABRIL";
else if(Mes.Text == "5")

else if(Mes.Text == "6")
 Mes.Text = "JUNHO";
else if(Mes.Text == "7")

else if(Mes.Text == "8")
 Mes.Text = "AGOSTO";
else if(Mes.Text == "9")
 Mes.Text = "SETEMBRO";
else if(Mes.Text == "10")
 Mes.Text = "OUTUBRO";
else if(Mes.Text == "11")
 Mes.Text = "NOVEMBRO";
else if(Mes.Text == "12")
 Mes.Text = "DEZEMBRO";" Name="Mes" Size="354.33071899414062;45.212230682373047"><TextFill type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.SolidFill" id="92" Color="Black" /><Font type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.FontDescriptor" id="93" FamilyName="Courier New" Underline="Off" Strikeout="Off" Italic="Off" Bold="Off" /><DataBindings type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBindingCollection" id="94"><Item type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBinding" id="95" Expression="new PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.Vector(12.4F, 3.231F).ConvertUnits(Unit.Centimeter,Unit.InternalUnit)" PropertyName="Location" /></DataBindings></Item><Item type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.AdvancedText" id="96" Location="1895.4796142578125;381.63604736328125" Text="ANO" TextAlign="MiddleLeft" GenerateScript="Ano.Text = Convert.ToString(Convert.ToDecimal(Convert.ToDateTime(GetData("DTS.Dt_emissao")).Year));" Name="Ano" Size="131.95310974121094;45.212230682373047"><TextFill type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.SolidFill" id="97" Color="Black" /><Font type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.FontDescriptor" id="98" FamilyName="Courier New" Underline="Off" Strikeout="Off" Italic="Off" Bold="Off" /><DataBindings type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBindingCollection" id="99"><Item type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBinding" id="100" Expression="new PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.Vector(16.048F, 3.231F).ConvertUnits(Unit.Centimeter,Unit.InternalUnit)" PropertyName="Location" /></DataBindings></Item><Item type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.AdvancedText" id="101" Location="1526.926513671875;823.087646484375" Text="BOM PARA" TextAlign="MiddleLeft" GenerateScript="if(Convert.ToDateTime(GetData("DTS.Dt_vencto")) > Convert.ToDateTime(GetData("DTS.Dt_emissao")))
{
 BomPara.Text = "BOM P/ "+Convert.ToDateTime(GetData("DTS.Dt_vencto")).ToString("dd/MM/yyyy").Trim();
}
else
{
 BomPara.Text ="";
}" Name="BomPara" Size="518.13897705078125;40.597934722900391"><TextFill type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.SolidFill" id="102" Color="Black" /><Font type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.FontDescriptor" id="103" FamilyName="Courier New" Underline="Off" Strikeout="Off" Italic="Off" Bold="Off" /><TextFormat type="PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Text.TextFormat" id="104" UseCultureSettings="true" FormatStyle="Date" UseGroupSeparator="true" FormatMask="dd/MM/yyyy" /><DataBindings type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBindingCollection" id="105"><Item type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBinding" id="106" Expression="new PerpetuumSoft.Framework.Drawing.Vector(12.928F, 6.969F).ConvertUnits(Unit.Centimeter,Unit.InternalUnit)" PropertyName="Location" /></DataBindings></Item></Controls><Aggregates type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.AggregateCollection" id="107" /></Item></Controls><Aggregates type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.AggregateCollection" id="108" /></Item></Controls><DataBindings type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.ReportDataBindingCollection" id="109" /></Item></Pages><GraphicsSettings type="PerpetuumSoft.Reporting.DOM.GraphicsSettings" id="110" InterpolationMode="Low" /></root>
